title: Horror Movies and The Paranormal - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/1/22
itunes:title: Horror Movies and The Paranormal - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/1/22
description:
George Noory and Mr. Lobo discuss the history of horror hosts through the advancements of Film and Television technology.  They also compare the current horror movie audience and style to the past generations of horror audiences. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
